explanation:
code_hardening: Added null checks for MotionEvent e1 and e2 before accessing coordinates; retained off-path validation unchanged.
resolve_compilation_errors: Removed Toast usage that required an Activity context; relied on existing instance methods nextImage() and previousImage() accessible from the inner class.
exception_handling: Preserved the original try-catch (Exception) structure and maintained the same return value behavior (always false).
logic_customization: Replaced right-to-left swipe action with a call to nextImage(); replaced left-to-right swipe action with a call to previousImage(); kept distance, velocity thresholds, and off-path logic unchanged. New custom API calls used: nextImage(), previousImage() (existing project methods).
refactoring: Clarified inline comments to reflect navigation behavior; no structural refactoring beyond action replacement.
misc: Removed all user-facing feedback (Toast messages); minimal comments added for clarity; no additional logging introduced.
